item.title: Mapping UK Local Political Data
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: As part of my PhD research, I needed to collect local political data for the UK and map these geospatially. This article explains how political results data was combined with geospatial boundaries to allow for use within my analysis. The code is fully reproducible, so if you want to repeat the analysis yourself, you can download the code used to build this page from my GitHub: https://github.com/mikey-harper/blog/tree/master/content/post Setup R was used to run the analysis.
